sentences.sContent: When will you be back in Ottawa?
sentences.sCn: 下次什么时候到渥太华来呀？

sentences.sContent: "At the end of the expedition we were losing three nautical miles a night ... it was quite a major factor," she told a news conference in Ottawa.
sentences.sCn: 在渥太华的一场新闻发布会上，她说：“在考察的后期，我们一晚上就会被冰流冲出去三海里……这也是一个主要因素。”

sentences.sContent: The Ottawa Charter of 1986 established the core principles of Health Promotion which seek to identify and positively affect the root causes, or determinants, of health.
sentences.sCn: 1986年的渥太华宪章确定了健康促进的核心原则，试图查明和积极影响健康问题根本原因或决定因素。

phrases.pCn: n. 渥太华大学（加拿大）
